website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a quality bowling ball that responds well to most bowlers' styles and lane conditions, you'd have a difficult time finding a better ball at this price point.
pros: Capable of impressive hook and back-end performance that's suitable for almost any bowler's skill level or technique style
Grips nicely on dry to medium-oiled lanes
cons: Doesn't perform well on heavily oiled lanes
Can be challenging for novices to use for picking up spares

customer_reviews.title: Great bowling ball!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great bowling ball! After decades of not bowling and bi-lateral knee surgery, I decided to pick up bowling again with my family. Bought this ball and am extremely impressed with the way it handles any type of lane. It fits my style of playing and has helped me to improve my game in a relatively short period of time. It's durable, does not scratch at all and looks as if it will run the gamut of anything I can literally throw at it. I can recommend this ball without exception!
